findings.title: Owner can change the tax, marketing and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax, marketing, and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude addresses from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Inclusion and Exclusion from AutoLiquidity
findings.description: The owner has the ability to include and exclude addresses from autoLiquidity, which can prevent swapAndLiquify from being called.

findings.title: Owner can change uniswapV2Router and _uniswapV2Pair
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify uniswapV2Router and _uniswapV2Pair.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to sell to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens sold and added to liquidity, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
